item.description:
Movies,karaoke and drinks. The kids are away this weekend
Hope some of you can join me
The movie we are going to see is vantage point
Saturday night at 4:35 at the westboro theater on route 9
Either plan to get your tickets before you get to the movie or plan to arrive early this movie comes out tomorrow


Lets plan to meet at the small tables by the snack bar at 4
After the movie we will get food and then go to Holligans

Thanks
Kerry Skinner
Independent Beauty Consultant
Phone: (508) 854-0552
Cell: (508) 868-0806
Email: KerrySkinner@MaryKay.com
WebSite: http://www.MaryKay.co...
item.how_to_find_us: Lets meet a Westboro movie theater will check movies and email an exact time later
item.why: You will have a great time and there are lots of fun people in the group

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: karaoke, and drinks and even a movie
